summary:
Father of Memes - Father of Memes (FOM) is an engaging DeFi ecosystem where memes pay the bills! Earn real Shib and Floki tokens every hour in a system so fun, even your Floki would approve. Join the meme revolution and watch your portfolio get memetastic!

 Tokenomics - Token Name: $Father of Memes
Symbol: $FOM
Total Supply: 111,222,333

 Roadmap for Father of Memes ($FOM) - # Phase 1
Launch & Activation
Launch $FOM token on DEXs.
Activate the Dynamic Meme Distribution Framework.
Start community voting for the third meme.

# Phase 2
Growth & Expansion
Develop new platform features to boost user engagement.
Integrate $FOM with other DeFi platforms to expand its utility.
Host cross partnerships to grow the community.

# Phase 3
Community Governance & Sustainability
Transition to full community governance for platform decisions.
Refine the reward framework and tokenomics for long-term growth.
Expand $FOM's reach beyond the crypto space.
